com.pb.sawdust.util.collections.cache

Class BoundedCountCache<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pb.sawdust.util.collections.cache.AbstractRefCache<K,V>
      • com.pb.sawdust.util.collections.cache.BoundedCache<K,V>
        • com.pb.sawdust.util.collections.cache.BoundedCountCache<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - The type of the keys held by this cache.
    V - The type of the values held by this cache.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cache<K,V>, java.util.Map<K,V>

    public class BoundedCountCache<K,V>
extends BoundedCache<K,V>
    The BoundedCountCache is a cache whose key-value pair count is limited. If the maxiumum size of the cache is reached, then any new elements added will cause the key with least recent reference (and its value) to be dropped. Key referencing is defined in the documentation for AbstractRefCache.

    • Method Detail

      • getValueSize

        protected int getValueSize(V value)
        Description copied from class: BoundedCache
        Get the size of a given value. This size is the amount the value counts against against this cache's bounding limit.
        Specified by:
        getValueSize in class BoundedCache<K,V>
        Parameters:
        value - The value.
        Returns:
        the amount the value counts against this cache's bounding limit.

      • getValueSizeFromKey

        protected int getValueSizeFromKey(K key)
        Description copied from class: BoundedCache
        Get the size of a given key's value. This size is the amount the key's value counts against against this cache's bounding limit. This is (and only should be) called after key (and its corresponding value) has been put into the cache. This method is called when cleaning the cache, and by default returns the following: 
        
     getValueSize(get(key));
        In some cases, it may be possible to avoid looking up the value to get the value's size; in such cases, this method can be overridden to avoid the performance penalty of the cache lookup.
        Overrides:
        getValueSizeFromKey in class BoundedCache<K,V>
        Parameters:
        key - The key.
        Returns:
        the amount key's corresponding value counts against the bounding limit.
